text: Makkum may refer to: ==Places in the Netherlands== *Makkum, Drenthe, a hamlet in the municipality of Midden-Drenthe, Drenthe province *Makkum, Littenseradiel, a village in the municipality of Littenseradiel, Friesland province *Makkum, Súdwest-Fryslân, a village in the municipality of Súdwest- Fryslân, Friesland province ==Other uses== *Royal Tichelaar Makkum, a Dutch pottery company ==See also== * Mackem, a nickname for people from Sunderland *Molen van Makkum, a smoke mill in Makkum, Drenthe province
title: Makkum
